Title: Otherhood
Writer: Mark Andrus (screenplay by), Cindy Chupack (screenplay by), William Sutcliffe (based on the novel 'Whatever Makes You Happy')
Actors: Angela Bassett, Patricia Arquette, Felicity Huffman, Jake Hoffman
Plot: A grounded, soulful, celebratory comedy about three mothers and their adult sons. The film explores the stage after motherhood, Otherhood, when you have to redefine your relationship with your children, friends, spouse, and most importantly, yourself.
